name: mecha_dm_test
description:
This is a really simple test project I used to learn Unity's networking. I might keep working on it when I have more ideas and stuff. It's real buggy right now by the way, so if you host for too long the game might get kinda unstable.

It's kinda fun I guess. Go play with friends.

Joining/hosting through NAT seems to have problems, ymmv

VALID MAPS:

dm_space

dm_desert

dm_urban

dm_mountain

choosing an invalid map just breaks the joining screen. oops

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

LMB/RMB - Gun L/R

Q/E - Extension L/R

Shift - Activate Jets

X - Buy Menu
